thread.title: Deutsche Bank Shake-Up Leaves Traders Exposed
thread.title_full: Deutsche Bank Shake-Up Leaves Traders Exposed - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: Deutsche Bank Shake-Up Leaves Traders Exposed
text:
When capital is tight, businesses must fight to show why they should be given it. Deutsche Bank has been struggling in that battle: that is why it trades at the biggest discount to book value of any big global bank.
The German lender’s shake-up of its business divisions, announced on Sunday, is one way to address this: it will foster clear internal competition to use the bank’s equity and shine a harsh light on the division that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
